page.title: 18CURRIE GAMES
page.content: A few children from Juniper Green conducted a survey of the games we play in 1985. The ten most popular are football, rugby, badminton, basketball, volleyball, hockey, ice-skting, swimming, tennis and ski-ing. All of these games are played by boys and girls except football and rugby which are played by boys only.Basketball is a game played by two teams of various numbers. It is played in a hall and at either side of the hall is a basket just over two metres from the ground. The aim of the game is for each team to throw the ball into the opposing team's basket as many times as they can.Volleyball is played with two teams and a light ball which you keep going across the net with your hands.
